title: My League Icon is a white piece of paper?
body: Hello, when I go to launch league I don't have the typical league of legends icon. It's just a white piece of paper. Any way to fix this?

replies.body:
It sounds like your launcher's shortcut is broken. You should be able to find **lol.launcher.admin.exe** inside of your League installation folder. This is most likely located in **C:\Riot Games\League of Legends**. 

You can simply right click on that file, select *copy* and then right click on your desktop to *paste* a new shortcut there. Let me know if this helped.
